details.title: Simulation system of telemetering and telecontrol for unmanned aerial vehicle
details.abstract: The unmanned aerial vehicle (UAV) which is capable to observe the Earth has wide applications and large quantities, such as reconnaissance and surveillance, attack on the ground, fire-proof forest, and marine search and rescue, and so on. The system of simulation composed of tracking, navigation, telecontrol, telemetering, and flight control is introduced in this paper. The method of simulation on telemetering and telecontrol, tracking and position, and target observation and tracking is explained
details.journal_title: IEEE Aerospace and Electronic Systems Magazine
